note.p: Daughter of Nicholas Kendall, chaplain of the Cornwall county gaol at Bodmin, and his wife Sophia Ann Colenso, a sister of John William Colenso, bishop of Natal. Married Spencer Percival Butler in 1863.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1904/396/4)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 May 2015)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 May 2015)
